code: import React,{useState}from'react';import"./ModalStyle.css";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faXmark}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EditTaskModal=_ref=>{let{initialText,onSave,onCancel}=_ref;const[text,setText]=useState(initialText);const handleSave=()=>{if(text.trim()===''){alert('No puedes dejar la tarea vacía');return;}onSave(text);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modalOverlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modalContent",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onCancel,className:"cancelButton",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cancelIcon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faXmark})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Editar Tarea:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"textArea",value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"addTask",onClick:handleSave,children:"Guardar cambios"})]})});};export default EditTaskModal;
